products.title: Amazon Fossil
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 5000mm min drop: 500mm max drop: 4000mm fabric composition: 10% pes, 90% polyprop louvre width: 89mm &amp; 127mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist to tilt louvres. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
